message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand your budget constraint, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $170?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $170 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $155?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $155 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I'm really close to your budget now, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $145?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $145 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $135?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $150. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me at $150, I'll have to consider other options.
